funFacts.title: Fun Fact!
funFacts.day2: Jambiz Group was founded in 2010 by two entrepreneurs who wanted to give small businesses access to the same services as large corporations.
funFacts.day3: Jambiz Group has offices in Malmö (Gustav Adolfs torg 51) and Göteborg/Kungsbacka (Magasinsgatan 8c).
funFacts.day4: XBUS (Excellent Business Services) works by three core values: competence, hard work, and having fun!
funFacts.day5: Sprinta delivers products and services worth over 100 million SEK annually to both private and public sector in Sweden.
funFacts.day6: ProgressLEAD specializes in strategy, transformation, project, program and portfolio management.
funFacts.day7: Did you know there is a theater production company in Jamaica also called Jambiz? Talk about a name with international appeal!
funFacts.day8: Exceed Consulting focuses on making a positive difference by helping organizations with quality, sustainability, and business development.
funFacts.day9: SwCG (Swedish Consulting Group) serves as a meeting place for the entire IT industry, connecting clients with the best consultants.
funFacts.day10: Podium System is home to experts in travel and transport, planning and optimization – delivering tailored cloud-based solutions.
funFacts.day11: AnalyticLEAD offers deep expertise in information management, advanced analytics, data science and data governance.
funFacts.day12: LearningLEAD offers coaching, mentorship, courses and workshops within Project Management, Facilitation, and Lean-Agile Transformation (SAFe®).
funFacts.day13: Addends offers facilitation services using LEGO® Serious Play® methodology – believing business can be done better through playfulness!
funFacts.day14: Sprinta created CertumHub – an AI-powered platform for e-learning, compliance management, and sustainability certifications with 50+ course categories!
funFacts.day15: The name 'Jambiz' was created by combining the initials of the founders' names: Jorgen And Mikael's Business = JAMBIZ!
funFacts.day16: Jambiz provides security, development, and growth for member companies through collaboration and economies of scale.
funFacts.day17: XBUS offers support services including HR, Recruitment, Finance, Marketing & Communication, and Office Support – all under one roof!
funFacts.day18: Jambiz Group's vision: "The future of business lies in bringing together people and companies who want to develop themselves and the market."
funFacts.day20: Podium System's cloud platform delivers tailored solutions for customers in public sector, logistics, tourism and transport.
funFacts.day21: LearningLEAD instructors are SAFe® Program Consultants, PMP® certified, and LEGO® Serious Play® certified facilitators.
funFacts.day22: The Jambiz Development Center in Göteborg is formed by developers from both Sprinta and Podium System working together on innovative solutions.
funFacts.day23: Jambiz owns an apartment called 'Casa Progresso' in sunny Almuñecar, Spain! Employees can book it at a special price for their vacation getaways. ☀️🏖️

info.title: How the Calendar Works

welcome.title: 🎄 Welcome to the Advent Calendar!
welcome.content: Hey there! This is our Jambiz Advent Calendar – 24 mini-challenges to brighten up your December. Whether you're here for a quick brain teaser or just want to learn something fun about Jambiz, we've got you covered!

unlocking.title: 🔓 How Days Unlock
unlocking.content: Just like a real advent calendar, each day unlocks on its date in December. So day 1 opens on December 1st, day 5 opens on December 5th, and so on. You'll see a lock icon on days that aren't available yet – but don't worry, they'll be ready when the time comes!

challenges.title: 🎮 The Challenges
challenges.content: Each day has a different mini-game or puzzle waiting for you. We've got riddles, word games, memory challenges, and even some arcade-style action! Don't stress about being perfect – the goal is to have fun.

rewards.title: 🏆 Completing Challenges
rewards.content: When you complete a challenge, you'll get a fun fact about Jambiz and your colleagues! Plus, the day gets marked as complete with a nice green checkmark. Your progress is saved automatically, so you can close the browser and come back anytime.

replay.title: 🔄 Want to Play Again?
replay.content: Already finished a challenge but want another go? No problem! You can replay any completed challenge as many times as you like. It won't affect your completion status – once done is done!

christmas.title: 🎅 The Big Day - December 25th
christmas.content: Here's the best part: on Christmas Day (December 25th), EVERYTHING unlocks for everyone! So if you missed a few days or life got busy, don't sweat it. You'll be able to play all the challenges and see all the fun facts anyway.

extras.title: 🎁 Extras & Rewards Gallery
extras.content: Complete all 24 challenges (or just wait until Christmas!) and you'll unlock the Extras section with even more games and a gallery with all the rewards. Think of it as a little bonus for the dedicated adventurers!

tip.title: 💡 Pro Tip
tip.content: Your progress is saved in your browser's local storage, so we recommend using the same device and browser throughout December to keep your progress. If you switch devices, you'll start fresh on the new one – but remember, everything unlocks on Christmas anyway!

info.closing: Have fun, and happy holidays from the Jambiz team! 🎄✨
